projects.title: Portfolio AI Backend
projects.subtitle: Production-grade RAG Chatbot
projects.shortDesc: Production RAG chatbot with hybrid retrieval
projects.description: Production-grade RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) chatbot that serves as an AI portfolio assistant. Demonstrates advanced GenAI engineering patterns with a complete pipeline from intent classification to streaming responses.
features: LLM Intent Classification - gpt-4o-mini classifies queries into 8 intents
Hybrid Retrieval - 70% semantic + 30% keyword scoring
Query Expansion - Intent-aware query rewriting for better recall
LLM Reranking - Reorders retrieved docs by relevance
Token Management - tiktoken for context truncation
Streaming Responses - Server-Sent Events for real-time UX

projects.title: Document Dispatch System
projects.subtitle: Automated PDF Generation @ Kogta Financial
projects.description: Cron-based automation system that generates and dispatches personalized loan welcome letters at scale. Handles complete lifecycle from data extraction, PDF generation, multi-channel delivery to tracking.
features: Parallel PDF Generation - Concurrent creation using asyncio
Multi-language Support - English, Hindi, Marathi, Gujarati templates
Multi-channel Delivery - WhatsApp with RCS fallback
Retry Mechanism - Automatic retry for failed deliveries
Complete Audit Trail - Every delivery attempt recorded
impact: 75% query performance improvement via OpenSearch optimization
Automated end-to-end workflow replacing manual processes
